name: Close Combat: First to Fight
description:
Close Combat: First to Fight is an action-shooter game developed by Atomic Games and Destineer Publishing. It came out on 18-04-2005. 2K Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Close Combat: First to Fight on PC.
It was produced by Denby Grace. Herman Miller scored the game.
